channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title:
Resoconto delle consegne dei 4 vaccini approvati da EMA nei primi due trimestri del 2021 (Q1 e Q2)

🌍💻 Geospatial data is a key component of analytics and informed decision-making. The Google Cloud platform provides useful queries for robust analytics on #geodata. Check it out: https://t.co/PwtPjsBBWk https://t.co/UkDyshrLcM

...and that's a wrap on Alberta's #COVID19 school status map. The link now redirects to the "education and child care" page. I've made the entire history—every daily snapshot since Sept.—available in the Canadian COVID-19 Data Archive. #OpenData
https://t.co/6N2lZpOjLP

@pfnery @MBittencourtMD Sim, mas o garimpo p/ conseguir algo é de um trabalho considerável. Méritos p/ o pessoal do data science daqui.
Exemplo abaixo: opendata de SRAG 2021 do MS: 61% missing de vacina p/ influenza, 59% p/ PCR COVID, ~30% desfecho. https://t.co/QqgmDfJPdx

@jogmfs Itu rencana rancangan keuangan word bank, utl cegah, deteksi, dan response utk covid, ya wajar pengadaan dan pengajuan dana sampai 2025, mbok tulung di cerna baik2 dulu, itu world bank open data nya lho, bukan si indonesian fletet doang yg dapet, geram bet anjeng

Es fácil notar que Baja California Sur tiene hoy la más alta incidencia de casos activos COVID-19 por 100 mil habitantes en México (356), aún usando la limitada muestra Centinela de los datos abiertos de SSA.
Revisa casos activos para tu Estado: https://t.co/NqRzV1tGvV https://t.co/VDY6JuukoL

@Burgos @binerighetti Pois é, dados abertos, quando utilizados por quem não tem conhecimento sobre o assunto, acabam gerando esse tipo de confusão! É preciso checar e rechecar antes de publicar esse tipo de notícia. #datascience #ethics #opendata

Consulta nuestros #DatosAbiertos y conoce los espacios culturales de tu comunidad.

Quer aprender mais sobre dados abertos e data literacy? Então, cadastre-se para assistir a palestra do coordenador da @EscoladeDados, Adriano Belisario (@belisards),no programa de pós-graduação do @inpe_mct, em agosto. Inscreva-se em: https://t.co/DN25mrxZwu https://t.co/L12wLELPxU

@JesusRCuevas @CIDH @GobiernoMX Si tanto les preocupa la desinformacion, podrían: a) mejorar los sistemas de info pública del gobierno federal (páginas web, datos abiertos); b) responder puntualmente a las solicitudes de transparencia; c) construir series de tiempo que comparen datos de PP actuales con previos.

FUNDED! We have received $50,000 from the #CardanoCommunity to migrate our @Littercoin token from Ethereum to Cardano. We will now be hiring 3-4 developers for 3-4 months each to get paid working on #opensource #citizenscience #opendata collection tools & rewards!😎🌍🌋🚀💫📲💚🙌 https://t.co/W4YW2bQrfT

L'utilizzo di @github parte dell'Italia é un vero caso di eccellenza a livello mondiale. Quando ci vuole ci vuole.
Spero che venga utilizzato sempre piú spesso e per tutti i dati prodotti.
Cc @istat_it
https://t.co/KSLKWK5VtE

2) Year-to-date shooting data? It *can* be done, but I don't have it. Boston? Baltimore? Philadelphia? I guess maybe from open data, but I'm not certain you can get it. Maybe it's all open city data and the data is accurate. IDK. Murder data? Yes. Shooting data is tough.

Opendata Kerala is releasing the district boundary map of Kerala. We will be maintaining the repo. Data is exported from @openstreetmap . District maps used in govt/media are old ones (based on 1998)
https://t.co/5Y0CU0vjUu https://t.co/6kv5Khr6eS

9/9 I'd like to thank the @CDC_AMD program, especially @dmaccannell, for not only providing financial support for sequencing, but also for 📈 their sequencing efforts to enhance our surveillance program in Connecticut. We greatly appreciate their commitment to open data sharing💪

Cette étude en vie réelle a été réalisée en France entre le 18 janvier et le 23 mai (donc avant la véritable arrivée du variant Delta), en croisant les données de la vaccination (VAC-SI) et celles des tests (SI-DEP). Celles-ci ne sont pas en open data (poke @eorphelin). 5/5 https://t.co/Ic0qhd6TMs

In de laatste vijf jaar (2016-2021) is het aantal #melkkoeien in Limburg (-18%), Noord-Brabant (-16%) en Zuid-Holland (-15%) het snelst gekrompen. In deze provincies verdween tevens een kwart van de bedrijven met melkkoeien in vijf jaar tijd. https://t.co/GzrvP5vUdc https://t.co/iCKqtCpgsA

An observation about open data trends in journals. @JPART1991 we require authors to make their data publicly available to readers, except when ethically prevented from doing so. US based PhD student authors I am interacting with are unprepared to meet the requirement 1/3

The latest on Data@Urban: @eleanorble, Yipeng Su, & @yfreemark explain how they used open data to identify investor-owned single-family rental properties & explore the landscape of landlords in the Twin Cities. https://t.co/ZFHt6QMaQ9

Embracing strong #OpenData practices leads to stronger outcomes & builds residents’ trust in city hall.
Learn how @TheCityofBR, @Chattanooga_gov, @CityLittleRock, and @CityOfMemphis are putting open data to work in their cities via @WhatWorksCities: https://t.co/LgCyqyCMXg

Copilot can have a huge impact on society as a whole, but it needs to be open.
Open it up to scrutiny, verification and public contribution.
Open model, open data, open algorithm.
Copilot is going to push bias into your code, but you will have no idea what that bias is.

Daily vacc data by state. Green boxes indicate record highs. @Khairykj kudos, we love the open data!
Based on our projections, we could reach the NRP thresholds as following:
10%: 1st week - 2nd week of July 40%: last week of August 60%: last week of September https://t.co/4Ey6ctkZ4O

Es de ese modo que se hace la curva epidemiológica con el promedio diario últimos 7 días, es lo más próximo a los #DatosAbiertos ya sea por fecha de defunción o por fecha de prueba positiva. Es un error sacar conclusiones viendo sólo las cifras día a día como los reporta el MINSA
